p: The soil seed bank of the studied stands has an overall 42 plant species comprising a total of 3643 individuals. Out of them, 1810 individuals of N. glauca were recorded in the seed bank under the canopy, while 233 individuals were recorded outside canopy. Among the recorded plants, four species ( Solenostemma argel, Spergula fallax, Cenchrus ciliaris, and Pennisetum setaceum) only exist in the soil seed bank under canopy of N. glauca, while eight species were recorded outside the canopy ( Fig. S1).
